column3: now => [ param:geo:Location ] of ( ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:servesCuisine:String =~ " هندی " ) ) ) [ 1 ] ) => notify

column2: جستجوی یک رستوران چینی در LOCATION_0 با حداقل NUMBER_0 بررسی.
column3: now => ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:aggregateRating.reviewCount:Number >= NUMBER_0 and param:geo:Location == LOCATION_0 and param:servesCuisine:String =~ " چینی " => notify

column2: رتبه بندی pizzeria uno در LOCATION_0 چقدر است؟
column3: now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:geo:Location == LOCATION_0 and param:name:String =~ " pizzeria uno " ) => notify

now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant) == " نوار برمودا " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ) => notify

column2: مکان و نام نزدیکترین رستوران مکزیکی را به من نشان دهید.
column3: now => [ param:geo:Location ] of ( ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:servesCuisine:String =~ " مکزیکی " ) ) ) [ 1 ] ) => notify
